summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6415 for the improvement of NORTHEAST 137TH STREET from 15th Avenue Northeast to 22nd Avenue Northeast; and from 26th Avenue Northeast to approximately 175 feet easterly of 27th Avenue Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same.
